caption.title: A breakdown of the genotypes for the three clinically important forms of α-thalassaemia – Hb Bart’s hydrops fetalis, deletional HbH disease and non-deletional HbH disease – and the Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium (HWE) proportions used for their calculation.
caption.p: To compare our model output with previous newborn estimates for Hb Bart’s hydrops fetalis and deletional HbH disease, we paired our allele frequency maps with 2003 demographic and birth data and included a measure of consanguinity in our calculations.

tr.th: Inclusion of population coefficient of consanguinity (F)
